channel.title: Quantura Blog
channel.description: Forecasting notes and market workflows from Quantura.

item.title: Options Chain Primer: Implied Probability in Practice
item.description: A practical guide to reading options data alongside forecast bands and trend overlays.

item.title: The Weekly Research Loop: Screener to Terminal to Dashboard
item.description: A practical weekly workflow: discover candidates in the screener, validate in the terminal, and record decisions in the dashboard.

item.title: Meta Prophet Quantiles: Reading Forecast Bands
item.description: How to choose quantiles, read uncertainty bands, and compare Meta Prophet vs IBM TimeMixer inside the terminal.

item.title: Weekly Market Brief (2026-02-09)
item.description: Trending tickers, momentum snapshot, and a workflow to validate setups in the terminal.
